chapter: External causes of morbidity and mortality
block: Surgical and other medical procedures as the cause of abnormal reaction of the patient, or of later complication, without mention of misadventure at the time of the procedure

title: Other reconstructive surgery
inclusion: correct drug properly administered in therapeutic or prophylactic dosage as the cause of any adverse effect

exclusion: accidental overdose of drug or wrong drug given or taken in error
